articles.title: Britney Spears reveals she got her blood drawn during conservatorship - Daily Mail
articles.description: The pop sensation, 40, claimed on Instagram on Monday that nurses watched her change three times a day during a four month time frame. Britney also alleged she had to have her blood drawn.

articles.title: Rapper Fetty Wap pleads guilty to drugs charges and faces a minimum of five years in prison - Daily Mail
articles.description: The 31-year-old rapper, whose real name is Willie Junior Maxwell II, was arrested in October by federal agents for his part in alleged drug trafficking ring, and charged with conspiring to distribute.
